DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety tolerability multiple dos LY2127399 Japanese patient rheumatoid arthritis ( RA ) .The study consist 20 week treatment period . All subject follow 12 week last study drug administration .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Japanese Patients With Rheumatoid Arthritis
DOC.criteria: Have give write informed consent Women must pregnant , breastfeed risk become pregnant study participation Diagnosis Rheumatoid Arthritis Active Rheumatoid Arthritis Current , regular use Methotrexate , stable dose Body weight 40 105 kg , inclusive Use exclude medication ( review study doctor ) Have medical finding , opinion study doctor , put patient unacceptable risk participation study Have recent ongoing infection , opinion study doctor put patient unacceptable risk participation Evidence tuberculosis Have systemic inflammatory condition RA
